data.text: Ah, you're here again. Hello～.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, you're here again. Hello～.

data.text:
I had spent the past few days watching Hishi Miracle training…… I was 
trying to figure out what it was that made me curious about her.
data.processed:
󠁿I had spent the past few days watching Hishi Miracle training…… I was 
󠁿trying to figure out what it was that made me curious about her.

data.text:
Today's focus is on step placement～. 
Make sure you help me with studying again when it's over～.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Today's focus is on step placement～. 
󠁿Make sure you help me with studying again when it's over～.

data.text:
Huh, that trainer is here again! 
Heeey～!
data.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Huh, that trainer is here again! 
󠁿Heeey～!

data.text:
Aren't they showing up pretty often? 
Does this mean you're going to debut, Mira-ko?
data.name: Cynical Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Aren't they showing up pretty often? 
󠁿Does this mean you're going to debut, Mira-ko?

data.text:
Heh…… what're you gonna do～? What if I actually have amazing talent, 
and I'm on my way to becoming a Triple Crown Uma Musume……?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Heh…… what're you gonna do～? What if I actually have amazing talent, 
󠁿and I'm on my way to becoming a Triple Crown Uma Musume……?

data.text: No way, no way.
data.name: Both
data.processed: 󠁿No way, no way.

data.text: So mean～!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿So mean～!

data.text:
Hishi Miracle was the same as usual, running 
leisurely together with her friends. However――
data.processed:
󠁿Hishi Miracle was the same as usual, running 
󠁿leisurely together with her friends. However――

data.text:
Hmmm～…… we're going to pick up the pace now, 
what do you wanna do Mira-ko?
data.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Hmmm～…… we're going to pick up the pace now, 
󠁿what do you wanna do Mira-ko?

data.text:
Ahh～……take it easy, the same as usual～. 
My engine isn't really warmed up just yet～.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ahh～……take it easy, the same as usual～. 
󠁿My engine isn't really warmed up just yet～.

data.text:
Got it. Make sure you finish in time though, 
or else the instructor is gonna scold you.
data.name: Cynical Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Got it. Make sure you finish in time though, 
󠁿or else the instructor is gonna scold you.

data.text: Aha. Yeah～
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Aha. Yeah～

data.text:
Hishi Miracle was left behind. However―― right around the time when 
the other Uma Musume were crossing the goal――
data.processed:
󠁿Hishi Miracle was left behind. However―― right around the time when 
󠁿the other Uma Musume were crossing the goal――

data.text: Huu, huu, huu……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Huu, huu, huu……

data.text:
Huu…… finally I'm starting to get warmed up. 
All～right!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Huu…… finally I'm starting to get warmed up. 
󠁿All～right!

data.text:
As I expected, Hishi Miracle started to surge forward. The other Uma 
Musume weren't nearby so they wouldn't have noticed at all.
data.processed:
󠁿As I expected, Hishi Miracle started to surge forward. The other Uma 
󠁿Musume weren't nearby so they wouldn't have noticed at all.

data.text:
Ahhh～ I'm tired! 
Let's take it easy with the stretches～.
data.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Ahhh～ I'm tired! 
󠁿Let's take it easy with the stretches～.

data.text:
After this we still have to do weight training, it's gonna be rough～…… 
By the way, do you have the English print out from last week?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿After this we still have to do weight training, it's gonna be rough～…… 
󠁿By the way, do you have the English print out from last week?

data.text:
I've got it but……did you do something with yours again? 
The teacher said those would be questions on the test.
data.name: Cynical Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿I've got it but……did you do something with yours again? 
󠁿The teacher said those would be questions on the test.

data.text:
Weeeell～…… that teacher's print outs are really thin so I get them 
mixed up with other things and end up throwing them away～……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Weeeell～…… that teacher's print outs are really thin so I get them 
󠁿mixed up with other things and end up throwing them away～……

data.text:
She took it easy while stretching and talking to her friends. 
After that, they took it easy on the weight training too.
data.processed:
󠁿She took it easy while stretching and talking to her friends. 
󠁿After that, they took it easy on the weight training too.

data.text:
After that, they did some more light stretches. After school 
training should have been over at that point, but……
data.processed:
󠁿After that, they did some more light stretches. After school 
󠁿training should have been over at that point, but……

data.text:
On the grounds in the evening, when the number of people 
was lowest, Hishi Miracle was still continuing her training.
data.processed:
󠁿On the grounds in the evening, when the number of people 
󠁿was lowest, Hishi Miracle was still continuing her training.

data.text:
It was slow-paced, and also fairly basic. 
However, if you looked closely――
data.processed:
󠁿It was slow-paced, and also fairly basic. 
󠁿However, if you looked closely――

data.text: ……Alright. Then, next is……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……Alright. Then, next is……

data.text: Howaah!?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Howaah!?

data.text:
You scared me. So it's just Trainer-san～, huh……? 
Staying out here so late, is something wrong?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿You scared me. So it's just Trainer-san～, huh……? 
󠁿Staying out here so late, is something wrong?

data.text:
There were a lot of things I wanted to say. I wanted to have at 
least one proper conversation, so I called out to her.
data.processed:
󠁿There were a lot of things I wanted to say. I wanted to have at 
󠁿least one proper conversation, so I called out to her.

data.text:
Geh, are you here to scold me? 
I know it kinda looks like I've been slacking but……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Geh, are you here to scold me? 
󠁿I know it kinda looks like I've been slacking but……

data.text: ……Huh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……Huh?

data.text:
As an example, the weight training they just 
did―― while the pace may have been slow, they 
were still gradually increasing the weight used.
data.processed:
󠁿As an example, the weight training they just 
󠁿did―― while the pace may have been slow, they 
󠁿were still gradually increasing the weight used.

data.text:
Ahaha, we never finish in time though～. 
So I figured we should at least increase the load～.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ahaha, we never finish in time though～. 
󠁿So I figured we should at least increase the load～.

data.text:
Considering their previous run, today's condition, and her words 
just now about 『Not finishing in time』. I was convinced.
data.processed:
󠁿Considering their previous run, today's condition, and her words 
󠁿just now about 『Not finishing in time』. I was convinced.

data.text:
This Uma Musume named Hishi Miracle―― she had amazing potential, 
it just took longer for her to warm up……the 『Slow Start』 type!
data.processed:
󠁿This Uma Musume named Hishi Miracle―― she had amazing potential, 
󠁿it just took longer for her to warm up……the 『Slow Start』 type!

data.text:
Eh～? 
Ehehe, to think you'd praise me like that～……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Eh～? 
󠁿Ehehe, to think you'd praise me like that～……

data.text:
It kinda increases my motiviation just a little bit. 
It'd be nice if that was enough for me to win though――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿It kinda increases my motiviation just a little bit. 
󠁿It'd be nice if that was enough for me to win though――

data.text:
It's true that her engine was slow to start. 
Without doing something about that, she wouldn't 
be able to catch up. However――
data.processed:
󠁿It's true that her engine was slow to start. 
󠁿Without doing something about that, she wouldn't 
󠁿be able to catch up. However――

data.text:
I can win…… So I can win, huh? 
Fufu, even something so simple makes me happy～.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿I can win…… So I can win, huh? 
󠁿Fufu, even something so simple makes me happy～.

data.text:
Maybe that was that 『Something』 that caught my 
attention that day. As long as you can realize 
her potential, she can surely bloom.
data.processed:
󠁿Maybe that was that 『Something』 that caught my 
󠁿attention that day. As long as you can realize 
󠁿her potential, she can surely bloom.

data.text:
She seemed happy with just this so 
far. With just a push, maybe this could 
be applied to her training……!
data.processed:
󠁿She seemed happy with just this so 
󠁿far. With just a push, maybe this could 
󠁿be applied to her training……!

data.text:
Fufuu, thank you very much. 
Because of that, I feel a little bit better――
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Leave it to me, I'll make you win!

data.processed:
󠁿Fufuu, thank you very much. 
󠁿Because of that, I feel a little bit better――

data.text: ……Huh? 『Make me win』?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: I want to form a contract!

data.processed: 󠁿……Huh? 『Make me win』?

data.text:
W-when did this conversation become so serious!? Suddenly saying 
something like that, it doesn't feel realistic～!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿W-when did this conversation become so serious!? Suddenly saying 
󠁿something like that, it doesn't feel realistic～!

data.text: Expectations……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Expectations……

data.text:
……Expectations, huh～……? I see. 
Hmmmmm～, in that case……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……Expectations, huh～……? I see. 
󠁿Hmmmmm～, in that case……

data.text:
Ah, but! At the very least make it, 『If I win』! 
A contract if I win the next Selection Race――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, but! At the very least make it, 『If I win』! 
󠁿A contract if I win the next Selection Race――

data.text:
If I don't win…… we can pretend 
this conversation never happened. 
……Then, I'll be leaving!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿If I don't win…… we can pretend 
󠁿this conversation never happened. 
󠁿……Then, I'll be leaving!

data.text:
Hishi Miracle told me her conditions for the 
contract. Is she gauging my ability as a trainer?
data.processed:
󠁿Hishi Miracle told me her conditions for the 
󠁿contract. Is she gauging my ability as a trainer?

data.text:
Or is there some other reason―― 
during this upcoming training, I'd 
have to learn more about her.
data.processed:
󠁿Or is there some other reason―― 
󠁿during this upcoming training, I'd 
󠁿have to learn more about her.
